characterInfo.Appears in: Words of Radiance, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription:
Veil is the alias that Shallan uses as she infiltrates the Ghostbloods, in effort (initially) to avenge the death of Jasnah at the hands of, as yet, some unknown member(s) of the organization.
Veil later develops her own separate identity from Shallan.
